vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a CS Commercial Service District and a resolution accepting the deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant with consideration being given to an MU-1 Mixed Use District on property zoned an A(A) Agricultural District, on the north line of Dowdy Ferry Road, northeast of the Lyndon B. Johnson Freeway [I-20]
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval of an MU-1 District, in lieu of a CS District
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval of a CS District, subject to deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant
Z212-332(JM)
